title: Family mourns bookstore owner found dead in creek: 'Extremely painful'
description: Birdsong Books owner Erica Atkins was found dead on Sunday, hours after she was reported missing from her home in Locust Grove, police said.

title: WATCH:  A grandpa is being kept active by his new puppy
description: Roscoe, the puppy, helps 81-year-old Walter Ross from Texas to stay in shape as he recovers from his knee surgery.

title: About 20 more hours of footage in Tyre Nichols case to be released
description: About 20 more hours of footage in Tyre Nichols' case will be released by Memphis city officials.

title: New bipartisan TikTok ban bill allows Commerce Department to scrutinize foreign tech
description: Sen. Mark Warner has cited concerns voiced by many lawmakers that the video-sharing app could be used as a propaganda tool of the Chinese Communist Party.

title: NTSB to open special investigation into Norfolk Southern
description: The National Transportation Safety Board said Tuesday it is opening a special investigation into Norfolk Southern's safety practices and culture.

title: Train, dump truck collide at Ohio crossing; conductor killed
description: Authorities say a train and a dump truck collided at a railroad crossing in Ohio, killing the train conductor as he stood on the outside of a car

title: Capitol Police chief slams Carlson's comments about Jan. 6 video as 'offensive'
description: Capitol Police Chief Thomas Manger said Fox News host Tucker Carlson's program was "filled with offensive and misleading conclusions" about Jan. 6.

title: US judge strikes down Missouri gun law as unconstitutional
description: A Missouri law banning local police from enforcing federal gun laws has been struck down as unconstitutional

title: $20,000 reward offered in fatal birthday party shooting of 2 children
description: A $20,000 reward is being offered in the investigation of a shooting outside a suburban Atlanta "Sweet 16" birthday party that left two children dead.

title: Marianne Williamson 'so sad to see' White House joke about her long-shot candidacy
description: Marianne Williamson responded in a Twitter video to Karine Jean-Pierre joking about her 2024 presidential campaign

title: 988 suicide lifeline expanding LGBTQ services with 24/7 chat and text
description: The 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline's LGBTQ pilot program is now offering text and chat services 24/7

title: What Fox News hosts allegedly said privately versus on-air about election claims
description: According to court documents, here's a look at what Fox News stars were privately saying about election fraud claims -- versus what they were saying on-air to viewers.

title: FBI offering $250K reward for unsolved Times Square bombing
description: The FBI announced a new reward Tuesday of up to $250,000 for information leading to the conviction of the suspect involved in an unsolved 2008 bombing in Times Square.

title: FDA: Two more eyedrops brands recalled due to risks
description: U.S. health officials are alerting consumers about two more recalls of eyedrops due to contamination risks that could lead to vision problems and serious injury

title: What to do if you're concerned you might be laid off
description: The job market in the U.S. remains strong overall, but recent high-profile layoffs at technology and media companies and predictions of a recession later this year have raised concerns about job security

title: Italy rejects any blame for deadly migrant shipwreck
description: Italy’s interior minister has strongly rejected claims that government policies to discourage illegal migration played a role in a Feb. 26 shipwreck off the nation’s southern coast in which at least 72 people died

title: Justice Department files suit to block JetBlue merger with Spirit Airlines
description: The Justice Department on Tuesday filed a lawsuit to block JetBlue's proposed merger with Spirit Airlines.

title: Biden to host South Korean leader Yoon for 2nd state visit
description: President Joe Biden will host South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol for the second state visit of his administration

title: Disheartened by legal limbo, DACA recipients leaving US
description: As a legal challenge takes aim at DACA, a growing number of young immigrants brought to the U.S. as children are choosing leave the country on their own terms.

title: 2 Americans kidnapped in Mexico found dead, 2 found alive
description: Two of the four Americans kidnapped in Mexico have been found dead, while the other two have been found alive.

title: Trial begins for fitness influencer accused of scamming thousands of customers
description: A trial for Texas fitness influencer Brittany Dawn Davis is set to begin on Monday. Davis is accused of not delivering personalized plans as promised.

title: Polish TV report: John Paul II knew of abuse as archbishop
description: A television news report says Pope St. John Paul II knew about sexual abuse of children by priests under his authority when he was an archbishop in his native Poland

title: 2 Italian air force planes collide mid-air, killing pilots
description: Two Italian air force planes collided in mid-air and crashed to the ground, killing both pilots

title: Teachers protest over suspected Iran schoolgirl poisonings
description: Iranian teachers have held protests in several cities over suspected poisonings targeting hundreds of schoolgirls

title: Elementary school teacher accused of putting students in chokehold
description: A Connecticut elementary school teacher has been arrested after she allegedly demonstrated a chokehold on her students, causing one of them to faint, authorities said.

title: China's Xi blames US for 'containment and suppression' amid tensions
description: On the sidelines of China's annual National People's Congress this week, Chinese President Xi Jinping aired frustrations aimed at the United States.

title: Suspect at large after man shot dead outside Lucas Oil Stadium, police say
description: A suspect remains at large after a man was shot dead outside Lucas Oil Stadium in downtown Indianapolis on Monday night, police said.

title: As 2024 Paris Olympics ticketing begins, some buyers raise concerns
description: As 2024 Paris Olympics ticketing begins, some buyers raise concerns.

title: Man who calls himself ‘Dolphin Dave’ arrested harassing whale, dolphins: Officials
description: A man who refers to himself as “Dolphin Dave” has been cited by Hawaii after he was caught repeatedly harassing a humpback whale and a dolphin pod on a snorkeling trip.

title: Hiker's body found after plummeting from rocky bluff and being swept out to sea
description: A hiker’s body has been recovered after he fell from a rocky bluff and was knocked unconscious during the fall and swept out to sea.

title: WATCH:  Falling ceiling panel narrowly misses subway passenger
description: A stunned subway passenger barely avoided being struck by a falling ceiling panel, which Massachusetts transit officials say may have weighed as much as 25 pounds.
